rules.content: When this creature enters or attacks, you may pay {r} to exile another creature card from your hand. You may cast those cards for as long as they remain exiled, and they costs {r} (or {1}) less to cast. When this creature leaves the battlefield, put the exiled cards into their owner's hands.
As long as ~ is enticed, it has flying.
Whenever you cast a card from exile, this creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
